Murray Hill/Kips Bay Bliss Café Possibly the most earnest establishment in Williamsburg, Bliss offers simple, well-prepared vegetarian and vegan food in cramped, boho-shabby quarters.

Williamsburg Brooklyn Grange The urban farm Brooklyn Grange defies expectation. For one thing, it’s in Queens. For another, it’s planted on the roof of the hulking Standard Motor Products Building, where the harvest is sold at a makeshift stand in the lobby. Load up on French breakfast radishes and lollo rossa lettuce, then head upstairs to glimpse the improbable acre under cultivation.
37-18 Northern Blvd., nr. 37th St.
Map Send to Phone
Health Food Vegetarian/Vegan
